main.remarks: This interface defines the operational contracts of DataItems.

method.name: CheckDataHash
method.summary: Verify the secure hash for this item. This does not check digital signatures.
method.returns: True if the current data matches the stored hash; otherwise, false.

method.name: ClearEncryptedData
method.returns: True if decryption is successful; otherwise, false.

method.name: DecryptData
method.param: The management key to use for decryption.
method.returns: True if decryption is successful; otherwise, false.

method.name: EncryptData
method.param: The management key to use for encryption and signing.
True to sign the encrypted data.
method.returns: True if encryption is successful; otherwise, false.

method.name: GetContentStream
method.summary: Opens a Stream from the FILE path. The Object's Content field is ignored.

method.name: GetContentStreamed
method.returns: True if the Object's Content is Streamed from FILE. Use GetContentStream instead of GetContent.

method.name: SetContentStreamed
method.returns: True if ContentStreamed and SecureHash set successfully.

method.name: SetType
method.returns: Returns true if Type was set successfully.

method.name: SignData
method.summary: Digitally sign the hash for the specified field using the provided ManagementKey.
method.param: The ManagementKey containing the certificate for signing.
method.returns: The key string used to store the signature, or null if signing failed.

method.name: ToFile
method.returns: Returns true if Object successfully written to file.

method.name: VerifyData
method.summary: Verify the digital signature for the specified field using the provided ManagementKey.
method.param: The ManagementKey containing the certificate for verification.
method.returns: True if the signature is valid; otherwise, false.

method.name: ZeroData
method.summary: Zeros the data content of the item.
method.remarks: Does NOT securely erase data on physical media.
method.param: The ManagementKey to authorize the operation.
method.returns: True if the data was successfully zeroed; otherwise, false.
